hero.title: About Scarfes
hero.subtitle: We are passionate about bringing you the finest collection of scarves, shawls, and wraps from around the world. Our mission is to help you express your unique style with premium quality accessories.

story.title: Our Story
content: Founded in 2020, Scarfes began as a small passion project with a simple mission: to curate the world's most beautiful and high-quality scarves. What started as a personal collection has grown into a trusted destination for scarf enthusiasts worldwide.

We work directly with artisans and manufacturers from renowned textile regions, ensuring that every piece in our collection meets our strict standards for quality, craftsmanship, and ethical production.

Today, we're proud to offer a carefully curated selection of scarves that celebrate both traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design, helping our customers express their individuality through timeless style.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

qualityFirst.title: Quality First
qualityFirst.description: We never compromise on quality. Every scarf is carefully selected for its materials, craftsmanship, and durability.

ethicalSourcing.title: Ethical Sourcing
ethicalSourcing.description: We partner with suppliers who share our commitment to fair labor practices and sustainable production methods.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We're committed to providing exceptional service and support.

globalInspiration.title: Global Inspiration
globalInspiration.description: We draw inspiration from cultures around the world, bringing you unique designs and traditional techniques.
